create table COMPTE
(
    COMPT_ID          NUMBER(3)     not null
        constraint PK_COMPTE
            primary key,
    PERS_ID           NUMBER(3)     not null
        constraint FK_COMPTE_PERS
            references PERS,
    COMPT_VAL_FIAT    NUMBER(10, 3) not null,
    COMPTE_VAL_CRYPTO NUMBER(10, 2)
)
/

create unique index I_FK_COMPTE_PERS
    on COMPTE (PERS_ID)
/

-- auto-generated definition
create table CRYPTO
(
    CRYPT_ID    VARCHAR2(32) not null
        constraint PK_CRYPTO
            primary key,
    CRYPT_NOM   VARCHAR2(32) not null,
    CRYPT_ACHAT FLOAT        not null,
    CRYPT_VENTE FLOAT,
    CRYPT_EVOL  FLOAT        not null
)
/

-- auto-generated definition
create table FACTURE
(
    COMPT_ID            NUMBER(3) not null
        constraint FK_FACTURE_COMPTE
            references COMPTE,
    FACTURE_DATE_PERIOD DATE,
    FACTURE_PRIXTOTAL   NUMBER(10, 2),
    FACTURE_ID          NUMBER(3) not null
        constraint PK_FACTURE
            primary key
)
/

create index I_FK_FACTURE_COMPTE
    on FACTURE (COMPT_ID)
/

-- auto-generated definition
create table PERS
(
    PERS_ID       NUMBER(3)    not null
        constraint PK_PERS
            primary key,
    PERS_NOM      VARCHAR2(32) not null,
    PERS_PRENOM   VARCHAR2(32) not null,
    PERS_USERNAME VARCHAR2(32),
    PERS_PASSWORD VARCHAR2(32)
)
/
-- auto-generated definition
create table TRANSAC
(
    TRANSAC_ID         NUMBER(5)  not null
        constraint PK_TRANSAC
            primary key,
    COMPT_ID           NUMBER(3)  not null
        constraint FK_TRANSAC_COMPTE
            references COMPTE,
    CRYPT_ID           NUMBER(10) not null,
    TRANSAC_DATE       DATE       not null,
    "TRANSAC_QUANTITï¿½" NUMBER(10) not null,
    TRANSAC_TYPE       NUMBER(1)  not null,
    TRANSAC_PRIX       NUMBER(10, 5)
)
/

create index I_FK_TRANSAC_COMPTE
    on TRANSAC (COMPT_ID)
/

create unique index I_FK_TRANSAC_CRYPTO
    on TRANSAC (CRYPT_ID)
/
